seo.title: Mobile App development and IOT Prototyping
seo.description: Ubidreams is a digital agency based in La Rochelle. We are specialized in mobile application development, ux design and the creation of connected objects.

hero.title: Mobile App development and IOT Prototyping
hero.description: Ubidreams supports you in carrying out your tailor-made development projects and also offers you a range of dedicated software for your CYBERSECURITY, GDPR, and IP telephony activities.

introduction.title: Digital agency based in La Rochelle
introduction.subtitle: Digital dreams
introduction.content:
We are a digital service company for the creation of customised mobile and software solutions. Ubidreams support you in each stage of your digital transformation.

We are experts in the creation of web and mobile apps. We also create connected devices and  give you advice and technical expertise in intersecting fields of business software and application development.

featureContainer.title: Web and Mobile Development
featureContainer.description: We are specialists in the design and development of web business software and web and mobile applications.

featureContainer.title: Internet of Things
featureContainer.description: We bring you our expertise in IOT and we help you to create smart objects, connected to your IT tools.

featureContainer.title: Consulting
featureContainer.description: We guide you in all important stages of your digital strategy, GDPR, networks and cybersecurity, Business Intelligence and Data science.
